subject: Religion & Spirituality
title: Psychedelics and Spiritual Experience
description: One-minute skill: Psychedelics and Spiritual Experience.

hook.text: Psilocybin triggers mystical experiences identical to those described by saints. If a pill produces God, is God real?

buildup.text: Johns Hopkins studies show psilocybin reliably produces mystical experiences rated as life-changing by participants.

discovery.text: Participants report unity with the universe, profound love, and ego dissolution. These match classical mystical states.

twist.text: If brain chemistry causes mystical experience, is God just neurons firing? Or did God design brains to find Him?

climax.text: Psychedelics don't prove or disprove God. They prove that spiritual experience is deeply wired into the human brain.

punchline.text: A pill triggers mystical states. The brain is wired for the sacred.

quiz.question: What have studies shown about psilocybin?
options: It reliably produces mystical experiences rated as deeply meaningful
